articles.title: Veetla Vishesham review. Veetla Vishesham Tamil movie review, story, rating - Telugu Cinema - IndiaGlitz
articles.description: The best thing about Veetla Vishesham is that it makes us adore the chemistry between a couple with two grown-up sons without any hesitation. This film is a lovely comedy-drama that will be perfect for the term 'family entertainer'.
